title: Baker Mordekaiser (BakerKaiser)
body:
I swear to god this would be the best idea ever for morde, him walking arround dressed as a chef with a massive spatula with a pizza oven chained to it as melee weapon. His W would be tiny slices of salami flying arround him in AOE. E would be that he kinda throws Flower in cone and his ultimate a rotating pizza. And as a fun thing about it. When you get the dragon. It has a chef hat aswell.

Hope you like the idea, pantheon and sivir would love a buddy in the business!

replies.body: I need a Morde joke skin
